keyMoments.title: Terry Gilteo Debut
keyMoments.description: Terry Gilteo appears for the first time as an intelligence controller for the Revolutionary Army, sorting through bounty posters at Baltigo.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a member of the Revolutionary Army and demonstrates the organization's intelligence operations.

relationships.description: Terry Gilteo serves under Dragon as an intelligence officer in the Revolutionary Army.

evolutionMoments.description: Terry briefs Dragon about Luffy's activities and bounty.

reveals.information: Member of the Revolutionary Army serving as an intelligence controller

keyMoments.title: Participates in Thousand Sunny Naming
keyMoments.description: Luffy suggests humorous names for the new ship before the crew settles on 'Thousand Sunny'.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's playful personality during an important moment for the crew.

keyMoments.title: Bounty Increases to 300,000,000 Berries
keyMoments.description: Luffy's bounty is revealed to have tripled from 100,000,000 to 300,000,000 berries following the Enies Lobby incident.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Luffy as one of the most wanted pirates in the world and demonstrates the World Government's concern about his threat level.

bounties.reason: Leading the assault on Enies Lobby and declaring war on the World Government

relationships.description: Dragon is Luffy's father, though Luffy is unaware of this connection. Dragon monitors Luffy's progress from afar.

evolutionMoments.description: Dragon sees Luffy's new bounty and reflects on his son's impact on the world.

keyMoments.title: Bounty Increases to 120,000,000 Berries
keyMoments.description: Zoro's bounty is revealed to have doubled from 60,000,000 to 120,000,000 berries.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Zoro as one of the most dangerous members of the Straw Hat crew.

bounties.reason: Participation in the Enies Lobby assault

keyMoments.title: First Bounty of 16,000,000 Berries
keyMoments.description: Nami receives her first bounty poster following the Enies Lobby incident.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Nami's official recognition as a wanted pirate by the World Government.

bounties.reason: Participation in the Enies Lobby assault

keyMoments.title: Sogeking Bounty of 30,000,000 Berries
keyMoments.description: Usopp receives a bounty under his Sogeking persona for 30,000,000 berries.
keyMoments.significance: Usopp's alter ego is recognized as a significant threat, though his true identity remains hidden from the World Government.

bounties.reason: Actions as Sogeking during the Enies Lobby assault

reveals.information: First bounty as Sogeking of 30,000,000 berries

keyMoments.title: First Bounty of 77,000,000 Berries
keyMoments.description: Sanji receives his first bounty poster, but with a poorly drawn composite sketch instead of a photo.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Sanji's wanted status while creating a running gag about his terrible wanted poster drawing.

bounties.reason: Participation in the Enies Lobby assault

reveals.information: First bounty of 77,000,000 berries with a composite sketch

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: First Bounty of 50 Berries
keyMoments.description: Chopper receives an insultingly low bounty of only 50 berries because he's mistaken for a pet.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a running gag about Chopper being underestimated by the World Government despite his contributions.

keyMoments.title: Bounty Remains at 80,000,000 Berries
keyMoments.description: Robin's bounty poster is updated with a new photo but the amount remains at 80,000,000 berries.
keyMoments.significance: Updates Robin's wanted poster with her current appearance as a confirmed Straw Hat member.

bounties.reason: Updated photo showing her as an active Straw Hat member

reveals.information: Bounty updated with new photo at 80,000,000 berries

keyMoments.title: First Use of Coup de Burst
keyMoments.description: Franky activates the Thousand Sunny's Coup de Burst for the first time, launching the ship into the air to escape from Garp.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky's engineering genius and the Thousand Sunny's advanced capabilities.

keyMoments.title: First Bounty of 44,000,000 Berries
keyMoments.description: Franky receives his first bounty poster as a member of the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Franky's official status as a wanted pirate and Straw Hat member.

bounties.reason: Participation in the Enies Lobby assault and joining the Straw Hat Pirates

abilities.description: Uses three barrels of cola to fire a cannon downward, launching the Thousand Sunny one kilometer into the air for emergency escapes.

reveals.information: Reveals the Thousand Sunny's Coup de Burst emergency acceleration system

name.japanese: モンキー・D・ドラゴン

keyMoments.title: Dragon Sees Luffy's New Bounty
keyMoments.description: Dragon observes Luffy's new bounty and believes his son's actions will cause people to question the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Dragon's awareness and approval of Luffy's path, setting up future connections between the Straw Hats and Revolutionary Army.

relationships.description: Dragon is Luffy's father and monitors his progress from afar, believing in his son's impact on the world.

evolutionMoments.description: Dragon sees Luffy's bounty and reflects on how his actions will inspire people to question the World Government.
